channel.title: Testing Authentication :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Testing Authentication Routes Now that we have our authentication system working for our application, let’s write some unit tests to confirm that it works as expected in a variety of situations. As part of these tests, we’ll end up creating a test double of one part of our authentication system to make it easier to test. To do this, we’ll use the Sinon library, so let’s start by installing it as a development dependency:
